meanings.definition: And others; and so forth; and so on.
meanings.sent1: We need to buy fruits, vegetables, etcetera for the party.
meanings.sent2: She packed her clothes, shoes, etcetera for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The grocery list said to get apples, bananas, etcetera - but no ice cream!
meanings.sent4: His collection includes stamps, coins, etcetera - a treasure trove of items.
meanings.sent5: The box was filled with toys, books, etcetera - a delightful mix of goodies.

meanings.definition: Used at the end of a list to indicate that further, similar items are included.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to bring your notebook, pen, etcetera to the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The ingredients for the recipe include flour, sugar, etcetera.
meanings.sent3: The to-do list had chores like laundry, dishes, etcetera - a never-ending cycle.
meanings.sent4: Her interests range from painting, dancing, etcetera - a colorful array of hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The box contained tools, nails, etcetera - a handy assortment for the project.
